page.title: 19 Haleacre Workshops
page.content: Haleacre Workshops are a number of units hired out to people. The units themselves are old farm buildings.The actual crafts are very different.Two of the most interesting were the glass blower and the Inventor. Rather than one big business there are lots of little businesses.This is a list of the kind of work done there: special effects,market stalls,store rooms,furniture makers,restoration and re-upholstery work. Most people have been working there for three years.Some of the things they do are very interesting.The most common business is upholstery.It is all owned by one man.The units are dotted all over the place.The system of numbering is worked out by when the units came into use.There are about forty units and one office.Most people would move if they had enough money.
